scenario_text.value: Grr...

Why must we fight, Renamon? Don’t you want to
save Miyuki, too?
Don’t you talk like you know everything!

I promised to protect her! And I’m the only
one who can save her!
But...don’t we all want the same thing?

Not Haru, not Takuma, not any of you... I’ll
save Miyuki! ME!
Renamon...

I’ll tell you all something. I know where
your friend is.
Our friend?! You don’t mean...
Aoi.

Come to the library if you want to save her.
Oh, and...
Get ready to atone for your sins.

Don’t come, and they’re dead—Aoi and Labramon
both. So you know what to do.
Aoi... Did the enemy really catch her?
Can we say for sure? Could be a bluff...

Alas, but that didn’t sound like bluster to
my ears.
But ain’t it weird?

If they’ve really got her, why haven’t they
sacrificed her already?

I bet they’re trying to lure the others and
get more sacrifices.
So then...it’s all one big trap.
Even so, we gotta do what we gotta do.
Yeah! We gotta save them!

...Let us go. I believe the library should
come into view a bit further ahead.
